Html:
Hello,
Is it possible to convert 3gpp file (audio) uploaded through smartphones to mp3 file format?

hi, I'm afraid this isn't something directly supported by NAudio. You'd need to decode the 3gp to PCM and then convert to MP3 as a secondary step. You may be able to find utilities that can do this on the web for free.

Mark

Please note that this thread is likely to get replies from spammers. I will be deleting replies that are blatant adverts for commercial software.

Thanks Mark.

Can you provide some link for such utilities ?

Regards
Indra
